E_CANNOT_FIND_ROUTE.message: Cannot find route "{{ routeIdentifier }}". Make sure the route exists and can be detected by static analysis, more on this on https://radonis.vercel.app/docs/compiler#static-analysis

E_MISSING_ROUTE_PARAM.message: The "{{ paramName }}" param is required to make the URL for the "{{ pattern }}" route

E_WILDCARD_ROUTES_NOT_SUPPORTED.message: Wildcard routes are currently not supported by the URL builder

E_MISSING_FETCH.message: No implementation of `fetch` is available server-side. Please include a polyfill
